wikipedia_page.main: Margaret Ruth Peacocke (born 1930), also known as Meg Peacocke, is an English poet.

response: Anthony Meredith's biography of Bennett was published in November 2010. Bennett is survived by his sister Meg (born 1930), the poet M. R. Peacocke, with whom he collaborated on a number of vocal works.
*Cholmondeley Award: Jane Duran, Christopher Logue, M. R. Peacocke, Neil Rollinson
* Cholmondeley Award: Jane Duran, Christopher Logue, M. R. Peacocke, Neil Rollinson
